translation.en: [woman 1] Tight knees, tight knees.
translation.zh: 膝盖绷紧

translation.en: Head in, Abbie.
translation.zh: 头要收住 艾比

translation.en: [woman 2] When I was young, my dream was always to go to the Olympics.
translation.zh: 我小时候 梦想一直是参加奥运

translation.en: And so I always had that in the back of my head.
translation.zh: 所以我头脑里一直有这个想法

translation.en: [woman 1] Guys, the goal is no arm circles on any of your sticks.
translation.zh: 大伙儿 目标是手臂不能弯曲

translation.en: Only count the ones that are stuck cold, okay?
translation.zh: 只有完全挺直的才能算 好吗？

translation.en: [woman 2] I just love gymnastics.
translation.zh: 我爱体操

translation.en: I love the drive that it gives me.
translation.zh: 我爱它给我的动力

translation.en: [woman 1] Carly, try not to stagger.
translation.zh: 查莉 不要晃

translation.en: [woman 2] It teaches you to be strong, independent.
translation.zh: 它教你变得坚强、独立

translation.en: [woman 2] Being able to fly through the air and do the things we do,
translation.zh: 能够在空中飞翔 做好动作

translation.en: it's just so thrilling, and you get that adrenaline rush and...
translation.zh: 非常令人兴奋 肾上腺素飙升

translation.en: You can't even explain it.
translation.zh: 无法解释

translation.en: [girls] Maggie! Come on, Maggie! Go, Maggie!
translation.zh: -加油 玛吉！ -上 玛吉！

translation.en: [boy] Yeah!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: [Maggie] I started gymnastics when I was three years old
translation.zh: 我三岁左右就开始练体操

translation.en: because I was always climbing out of my crib
translation.zh: 因为我总是爬出婴儿床

translation.en: and climbing on the furniture and everything, so...
translation.zh: 爬家具什么的

translation.en: my parents put me in it, just be in a safer environment
translation.zh: 所以父母就把我放到更安全的环境中

translation.en: where there's mats and coaches and stuff like that.
translation.zh: 有垫子 有教练 等等

translation.en: [woman 5] I liked the sport. I mean, I did it in high school.
translation.zh: 我喜欢体操 在高中练体操

translation.en: I always watched it on TV, and I loved it.
translation.zh: 我总是在电视上看体操 非常喜欢

translation.en: And so I had this little girl, after three sons, and I put her in it.
translation.zh: 我在生了三个儿子之后 生了一个女儿 就让她去练体操了

translation.en: So, yes, as a preschooler.
translation.zh: 嗯 学龄前就去了

translation.en: Right away, the coaches picked up on her.
translation.zh: 教练们立刻就注意到了她

translation.en: They nabbed her up as a little girl, like in second grade.
translation.zh: 大概是二年级就挑中了他

translation.en: I mean, she was the only ten-year-old in the country that competed at Nationals.
translation.zh: 当时参加全国比赛的选手中 她是唯一一个十岁的运动员

translation.en: [man] You know, somebody drove her to the gym, maybe 45 minutes from here.
translation.zh: 开车送她去体育馆 从这里过去大概45分钟

translation.en: Come back, maybe go back to work,
translation.zh: 回来 然后去上班

translation.en: pick up Maggie at the gym.
translation.zh: 接上玛吉 然后去体育馆

translation.en: That was every day for years and years and years.
translation.zh: 很多年 每天都是这样

translation.en: [woman] Here's Maggie Nichols, Level 10 junior from Twin City Twisters.
translation.zh: 玛吉·尼科尔斯小姐 初等10级 来自TCT体操俱乐部

translation.en: [Maggie] The goal was to try to be an elite gymnast and to make the national team.
translation.zh: 目标是成为高水平的体操运动员 进入国家队

translation.en: Did online school as well, so I could train more in the gym.
translation.zh: 也上了网校 这样就能在体育馆多训练

translation.en: And this is probably one of my favorite leos. Um...
translation.zh: 这大概是我最喜欢的紧身衣之一

translation.en: I love the white.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢这白色

translation.en: Like, I don't know what it is, but if it has white on it, I just-- I just love it.
translation.zh: 我不知道是为什么 但只要有白色 我就很喜欢

translation.en: I don't know why. [laughs]
translation.zh: 不知道为什么

translation.en: If you wanted to take the next step to make national team,
translation.zh: 如果你想要进入下一个阶段 想要入选国家队

translation.en: you need to be very strong, because gymnastics would be like...
translation.zh: 那你就要非常坚强 因为体操几乎就会成为你的一切

translation.en: you know, almost your whole life. I mean, it was almost my whole life.
translation.zh: 因为体操几乎就会成为你的一切 对我来说就是这样

translation.en: You give up almost everything.
translation.zh: 几乎要放弃一切

translation.en: [man 1 over PA] Now on balance beam for Twin City Twisters, Maggie Nichols!
translation.zh: 即将踏上平衡木的是 TCT体操俱乐部的玛吉·尼科尔斯

translation.en: [man 2] When I asked you who impressed you,
translation.zh: 我之前问你们 在西蒙·拜尔斯之后 你们觉得谁比较好

translation.en: in terms of who's coming up after Simone Biles,
translation.zh: 在西蒙·拜尔斯之后 你们觉得谁比较好

translation.en: you said Maggie Nichols was one.
translation.zh: 你们说玛吉·尼科尔斯算一个

translation.en: [woman] Talking to her earlier this week,
translation.zh: 本周早些时候跟她聊

translation.en: she said she finally feels like she's in the mix.
translation.zh: 她说她终于感觉有希望进国家队了

translation.en: [Gina] USA Gymnastics took Maggie's Olympic dream away from her.
translation.zh: 美国体操协会夺走了玛吉的奥运梦

translation.en: It was just so hurtful and so painful. Everything that happened.
translation.zh: 发生的一切 非常受伤 非常痛苦

translation.en: [John] We have fairly good ideas on... what actually happened.
translation.zh: 对于发生的事 我们还是比较了解的

translation.en: Evidence, I would say.
translation.zh: 可以说有证据

translation.en: [man] So you're watching justice happen in slow motion?
translation.zh: 所以听起来像是 你在看慢放的正义实现？

translation.en: Well, hopefully justice. [laughs] Hopefully justice.
translation.zh: 希望是会实现正义

translation.en: [man] When we started reporting on the initial story,
translation.zh: 当我们开始报道这个故事的时候

translation.en: this was really the most explosive story
translation.zh: 这真的是 《今日美国》多年来最爆炸性的故事

translation.en: that the USA Today Network has had in several years.
translation.zh: 《今日美国》多年来最爆炸性的故事

translation.en: Yet it was coming out of the sticks, you know?
translation.zh: 但确是从小地方爆出来的事

translation.en: [laughs] It was coming out of a small little newsroom.
translation.zh: 是从一个很小的新闻室中爆出来的

translation.en: Okay, what do we got?
translation.zh: 好的 有什么？

translation.en: Um, one of our sources who runs the popular blog--
translation.zh: 我们有一个信息来源 是做博客的 很有名…

translation.en: [man] Like everyone, I'd watch gymnastics during the Olympics,
translation.zh: 和大家一样 我在奥运会时会看体操

translation.en: and I had witnessed some of the stars, you know, over the years.
translation.zh: 这么多年来 我见证了一些明星

translation.en: USA Gymnastics was an organization in this town,
translation.zh: 美国体操协会这个机构就在当地

translation.en: but I really didn't know a lot about what was going on behind the scenes.
translation.zh: 但我当时对于幕后的情况并不了解

translation.en: So, you know, what that culture was like was new to me and, uh...
translation.zh: 所以我也不太了解那种文化

translation.en: and we sort of were plunged into it.
translation.zh: 我们就陷了进去

translation.en: [man 1] Every four years, it's our time to shine.
translation.zh: 每隔四年 就到了我们发光的时刻

translation.en: Our moment.
translation.zh: 我们的时刻

translation.en: When the toughest sport in the world
translation.zh: 当世界上最困难的比赛

translation.en: takes its rightful place on the world's biggest stage.
translation.zh: 在世界上最大的舞台上隆重登场

translation.en: The moment when the brightest spotlight shines
translation.zh: 这一刻 最亮的聚光灯

translation.en: on the best athletes these United States have to offer.
translation.zh: 照射在美国最优秀的运动员身上

translation.en: Every four years...
translation.zh: 每隔四年

translation.en: starts right now.
translation.zh: 从现在开始

translation.en: [man 2] It is one of the most in-demand events at the Olympics,
translation.zh: 这是奥运会上最受欢迎的比赛之一

translation.en: and it could be historic.
translation.zh: 这可能会成为历史的一刻

translation.en: In 1996, there was a Magnificent Seven.
translation.zh: 1996年有七仙女

translation.en: In 2012, a Fierce Five.
translation.zh: 2012年有超级五姝

translation.en: This group will make a name for themselves tonight one way or the other.
translation.zh: 无论如何 这个团队今晚将扬名立万

translation.en: [woman] As the Summer Olympics gets underway in Rio,
translation.zh: 夏季奥运会正在里约如火如荼地展开

translation.en: an IndyStar USA Today Network investigation
translation.zh: 《印第安纳波利斯星报》 和《今日美国》的调查显示

translation.en: unveils a possible sexual abuse scandal at USA Gymnastics.
translation.zh: 美国体操协会可能存在性侵丑闻

translation.en: It alleges the organization has a policy that may have harmed child athletes.
translation.zh: 调查声称体操队的政策 可能伤害了儿童运动员

translation.en: I had been working on an investigation into failure to report sexual abuse in schools.
translation.zh: 我之前做过学校性侵未报的相关调查

translation.en: We'd had a number of local cases in Indiana.
translation.zh: 我们在印第安纳有一些当地的案子

translation.en: And so, as I was looking at a broader piece on, why does this seem to keep happening?
translation.zh: 所以当我从更大的范围 去调查为什么总是有这样的事发生

translation.en: Why do people not report as they're required to do?
translation.zh: 为什么大家不按照要求报告

translation.en: A source suggested that I look at USA Gymnastics
translation.zh: 有一个信息源 建议我调查美国体操协会

translation.en: and how they handle sexual abuse allegations.
translation.zh: 看看他们怎么处理性侵举报

translation.en: And that source pointed me toward a lawsuit
translation.zh: 信息源让我去看一个诉讼案

translation.en: involving a predatory coach...
translation.zh: 案子涉及一个性侵的教练

translation.en: who had moved from gym to gym to gym,
translation.zh: 这个人从一个体育馆到另一个体育馆

translation.en: despite warning signs about his conduct.
translation.zh: 即便对于他的行为存在很多警示

translation.en: [man] One coach was shown to have abused a young gymnast
translation.zh: 显示有一位教练 性侵一名年轻体操运动员

translation.en: after USA Gymnastics had been warned about him years earlier.
translation.zh: 在多年前就已经有人 就此人向美国体操协会发出警示

translation.en: In the file, one complaint said,
translation.zh: 文件中 有一位投诉人说

translation.en: "This coach needs to be put in a cage before he rapes somebody."
translation.zh: “这位教练应该赶紧关起来 要不就该强奸别人了”

translation.en: Uh, USA Gymnastics did nothing.
translation.zh: 美国体操协会什么都没做

translation.en: [Kwiatkowski] As we were pursuing this investigation,
translation.zh: 在我们调查的过程中

translation.en: we got access to these depositions with current and former high-ranking USA Gymnastics officials
translation.zh: 我们看到了美国体操协会 现任和前任高级官员的证词

translation.en: that described their policy for how they handled these allegations.
translation.zh: 对他们处理这些指控的政策 进行了说明

translation.en: [man] Mr. Penny, uh, you are the president currently of USA Gymnastics?
translation.zh: （斯蒂夫·佩尼的证词） 佩尼先生 你现在是美国体操协会主席？

translation.en: [Penny] Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [man] If you receive a complaint of sexual misconduct,
translation.zh: 如果你收到不正当性行为的投诉

translation.en: whether it be by a professional member or anyone that has a membership with USAG,
translation.zh: 不论是体操队的职业成员还是会员

translation.en: do you turn it over to local authorities?
translation.zh: 你是否会交由当地政府处理？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: We don't turn over a complaint.
translation.zh: 我们不会移交投诉

translation.en: [Kwiatkowski] For the first time, it showed USA Gymnastics had a policy
translation.zh: 这是第一次看到 不将所有的指控向政府报告

translation.en: of not reporting all allegations to authorities.
translation.zh: 是美国体操协会的政策

translation.en: That they would dismiss allegations as hearsay
translation.zh: 他们会将指控视为传言不予处理

translation.en: unless they were signed by a victim, a victim's parent, or an eyewitness to the abuse.
translation.zh: 除非由受害者、受害者父母 或者证明侵害的证人签字

translation.en: [Berta] And we found USA Gymnastics had sexual abuse complaint files
translation.zh: 而且我们发现 美国体操协会 有54位教练的性侵投诉文件

translation.en: on 54 coaches.
translation.zh: 美国体操协会 有54位教练的性侵投诉文件

translation.en: And if there was no signed statement
translation.zh: 如果没有受害者或其父母的签字

translation.en: by the victim or the victim's parent, they just tucked it in a folder
translation.zh: 就直接放进一个文件夹

translation.en: and stuffed it in Steve Penny's filing cabinet.
translation.zh: 塞到斯蒂夫·佩尼的文件柜里

translation.en: And then those coaches went on to molest other children.
translation.zh: 然后这些教练继续威胁其他孩子

translation.en: [man 1] Get the gold medals ready again.
translation.zh: 又一次将金牌收入囊中

translation.en: [man 2] That is an Olympic gold medal-winning moment.
translation.zh: 奥运赛场上赢得金牌的时刻来到了

translation.en: [woman 1] As athletes are gathering in Rio,
translation.zh: 运动员们云集里约的同时

translation.en: a stunning report from The Indianapolis Star
translation.zh: 《印第安纳波利斯星报》 和《今日美国》发布惊人报告

translation.en: and USA Today Network dominated this day.
translation.zh: 《印第安纳波利斯星报》 和《今日美国》发布惊人报告 成为了今天的焦点

translation.en: [woman 2] The paper is reporting that, on multiple occasions,
translation.zh: 报告指出

translation.en: USA Gymnastics compiled complaints of coaches accused of sexual misconduct
translation.zh: 美国体操协会 收到了对于教练不正当性行为的投诉

translation.en: but refused to share the information with police,
translation.zh: 但拒绝将信息提供给警方 这种情况多次发生

translation.en: most often dismissing it as hearsay,
translation.zh: 多数情况下体操队 将投诉作为传言不予处理

translation.en: because the complaints were not made by the victims, those young athletes, or their parents.
translation.zh: 理由是投诉不是由受害人 即年轻运动员或其父母提出

translation.en: [woman 1] In a statement, Steve Penny, the president of USA Gymnastics,
translation.zh: 这个问题… 美国体操协会主席斯蒂夫·佩尼说

translation.en: said the organization is quote, "Committed to promoting a safe environment,"
translation.zh: 体操队“致力于营造安全的环境”

translation.en: and noted quote, "We feel The Star left out significant facts
translation.zh: 并称：“我们觉得《星报》 没有列出一些重要事实

translation.en: that would have painted a more accurate picture."
translation.zh: 导致其阐述的情况并不太准确”

translation.en: [woman] I was cleaning my kitchen,
translation.zh: 我当时在收拾厨房

translation.en: and I had two babies that were 13 months apart.
translation.zh: 我两个宝宝相差13个月

translation.en: And they were both fussy,
translation.zh: 两人都很吵闹

translation.en: and so I had my baby strapped to me.
translation.zh: 所以我就把一个宝宝绑在身上

translation.en: I was wearing her while I cleaned the kitchen.
translation.zh: 我收拾厨房的时候背着她

translation.en: And I needed to make a shopping list, so I opened my computer
translation.zh: 我要列一张购物清单 于是打开电脑

translation.en: and Facebook was up,
translation.zh: 脸书网页跳出来

translation.en: and trending in the news section was the headline for the IndyStar article.
translation.zh: 新闻栏热点信息 就是《星报》文章的头条

translation.en: It was a complete accident that I even saw it.
translation.zh: 我看见这个 都完全是意外

translation.en: But I clicked on it, and I read it right away.
translation.zh: 但是我立即点开看了

translation.en: And the first thought was, "I was right.
translation.zh: 我的第一个想法是：“我想得没错

translation.en: They've been burying sexual abuse. I was right.
translation.zh: 他们一直在掩盖性侵 我想得没错

translation.en: And this is it.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: Now's the time.
translation.zh: 时机来了

translation.en: If it's ever going to come out, it's going to come out now."
translation.zh: 如果能够曝光出来 现在是最好的机会”

translation.en: [Alesia] On the morning of publication of that first story...
translation.zh: 第一个故事发出在的那天早上

translation.en: we got an e-mail from Rachael Denhollander.
translation.zh: 我们收到瑞秋·丹霍兰德的一封电邮

translation.en: And she wrote, "My abuse wasn't by a coach,
translation.zh: 她写道：“侵犯我的不是教练

translation.en: but it was by a famous doctor.
translation.zh: 而是一个很有名的医生

translation.en: And if they're covering things up for the coaches,
translation.zh: 如果他们为教练掩盖

translation.en: I think they would be covering it up for him."
translation.zh: 我想也会为他掩盖”

translation.en: And that was the first time
translation.zh: 这是我第一次了解到

translation.en: I had heard there could be something wrong with Larry Nassar.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次了解到 拉里·纳萨尔可能有问题

translation.en: [woman] Hi, Mr. Alesia. My name is Jessica Howard.
translation.zh: 你好 阿莱西亚先生 我叫洁西卡·霍华德

translation.en: I just wanted to call you as a follow-up to your story.
translation.zh: 我给你打电话 是想说你报道的事

translation.en: Um, I am very nervous about talking to you about it, but...
translation.zh: 谈这件事 我很紧张 但是…

translation.en: I think it would help... bring justice to a lot of the people
translation.zh: 我想这能够有利于为很多人实现正义

translation.en: who have been affected by USA Gymnastics and their policies.
translation.zh: 美国体操协会及其政策 对他们产生了不利影响

translation.en: Thank you. Bye.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 再见

translation.en: When the... story came out in 2016...
translation.zh: 2016年时间曝光的时候

translation.en: Nassar just came back into my head.
translation.zh: 我脑袋里想起了纳萨尔

translation.en: When something hits you like... that realization that it was sexual abuse...
translation.zh: 当你突然意识到那是性侵

translation.en: and you haven't known, haven't thought about it...
translation.zh: 而你之前还一直不知道 没有这样去想过

translation.en: it becomes...
translation.zh: 这就变得…

translation.en: so real.
translation.zh: 极为真实

translation.en: Like it was yesterday.
translation.zh: 就像是昨天

translation.en: Like it just happened to you. Like you are 15.
translation.zh: 就像是刚发生 就像你回到15岁的时候一样

translation.en: [Dantzscher] My head started kind of like spinning a little bit.
translation.zh: 我的头脑开始有点晕

translation.en: I've never told anybody, but...
translation.zh: 我从来没有和任何人说过

translation.en: I was like, "Wait a minute...
translation.zh: 但是我心想：“等等

translation.en: this doctor used to do very similar things to me."
translation.zh: 有一个医生 以前也对我做了非常类似的事”

translation.en: At that point, I was... still scared, but...
translation.zh: 当时 我还是很害怕

translation.en: I was thinking, "If he is a pedophile...
translation.zh: 但是我想：“如果他是恋童癖者

translation.en: and I... don't do something about it, I can't live with that."
translation.zh: 如果我不采取行动的话 我自己接受不了”

translation.en: [man] I was approached by Jamie Dantzscher,
translation.zh: 洁米·丹泽谢尔来找我

translation.en: who was a 2000 Olympian.
translation.zh: 她是2000年的奥运选手

translation.en: And she told me the story about this. Dr. Nassar,
translation.zh: 她跟我说了纳萨尔医生的事

translation.en: and she felt like he had sexually assaulted her.
translation.zh: 说觉得他性侵了自己

translation.en: I believed her.
translation.zh: 我相信她

translation.en: After I agreed to take her case, I called The Indianapolis Star.
translation.zh: 我答应接她的案子之后 我给《印第安纳波利斯星报》打电话

translation.en: And I said, "Great article.
translation.zh: 我说：“文章很好

translation.en: By the way, have you ever heard of a guy named Larry Nassar?"
translation.zh: 对了 你们有没有听说过 一个叫拉里·纳萨尔的人？”

translation.en: I... I was stunned.
translation.zh: 我震惊了

translation.en: I mean, I just thought, "Now this is-- Now we're talking three people."
translation.zh: 我心想：“现在是三个人了”

translation.en: And these women didn't know each other.
translation.zh: 这些女性相互并不认识

translation.en: How many more could there be?
translation.zh: 还会有多少呢？

translation.en: [man 1] Oh, golly.
translation.zh: 噢 神啊！

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, dear. Oh, dear. Oh, dear. -[man 1] Oh, God.
translation.zh: -哎呀！ -神啊！

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, no. -Medical?
translation.zh: -不是吧！ -医生？

translation.en: Um, I didn't know a lot when I was 15,

translation.en: but one thing I did know was that abuse victims aren't treated well.

translation.en: They are mocked. They are questioned. They are blamed. They are shamed.

translation.en: Um, and that does incredible damage to the healing process.

translation.en: I wish I could have dealt with it 16 years ago.

translation.en: I don't think I could have, but I can now.

translation.en: I was very much a perfectionist,

translation.en: and that's what attracted me to the sport of gymnastics, was the perfection that it required.

translation.en: But my family wasn't able to afford gym fees,

translation.en: so I didn't start until I was almost 12.

translation.en: Because, at that point, I could work,

translation.en: and my siblings helped me clean the gym, and my mom worked to pay for my gym fees.

translation.en: But I was five-four when I started. Way too tall, long torso, wrong body type.

translation.en: I did it because I loved it. I was not any good.

translation.en: I was crazy. I look back now,

translation.en: and I was chucking triple-backs off a mini trampoline into the pit.

translation.en: I had no idea how talented I was. I was just... I was just having a good time.

translation.zh: 你参与体操的时候 有没有这样的教练 或者像纳萨尔这样的工作人员

translation.en: or other officials like Nassar, who the girls were suspicious of
translation.zh: 有没有这样的教练 或者像纳萨尔这样的工作人员 女队员们怀疑 或者指出其有性侵行为？

translation.en: or talked about as being abusive?
translation.zh: 女队员们怀疑 或者指出其有性侵行为？

translation.en: [Sey] Yes, absolutely.
translation.zh: 有的 肯定的

translation.en: There were sexual predators everywhere.
translation.zh: 到处都有性捕猎者

translation.en: They were in my gym.
translation.zh: 我队里就有

translation.en: The national team coach, Don Peters, was a known sexual abuser.
translation.zh: 国家队教练多恩·彼得斯 就是有名的性侵者

translation.en: They were everywhere across the country, and we knew who they were.
translation.zh: 全国到处都有 我们也知道他们是什么样的人

translation.en: Uh, but, more broadly, emotional and physical abuse was actually the norm,
translation.zh: 但更广泛地说 精神上和身体上的虐待是常态

translation.en: and we were all so beaten down by that...
translation.zh: 我们都备受打击

translation.en: um, and made so obedient
translation.zh: 以至于非常顺从

translation.en: that, when we knew that there was a sexual abuser in our midst,
translation.zh: 当我们知道我们中间有一个性侵者时

translation.en: we would never say anything. We were just...
translation.zh: 我们什么都不会说

translation.en: We felt utterly powerless.
translation.zh: 我们感到极度无助

translation.en: [woman] Now watch her face after this tumbling pass. She's hurt her ankle.
translation.zh: 这个翻腾串连做完之后 看她的脸 她弄伤了脚踝

translation.en: Do you see that little grimace? It hurts her.
translation.zh: 看到那微微的痛苦表情了吗？ 她受伤了

translation.en: [man] But she must go on here, the title at stake.
translation.zh: 但她必须继续 关系到金牌的归属

translation.en: The courage of Jennifer Sey led her on to the title as women's all-around champion of the USA,
translation.zh: 珍妮弗·赛的勇气 使她成为了美国女子体操全能冠军

translation.en: but the pain was a heavy price.
translation.zh: 但痛苦是沉重的代价

translation.en: [Sey] I started the sport in the mid-'70s.
translation.zh: 我从七十年代中期开始练体操

translation.en: And, I would say, the standard methodology
translation.zh: 我认为 精英体操运动的标准训练方法

translation.en: of coaching in elite gymnastics was cruelty.
translation.zh: 精英体操运动的标准训练方法 就是残忍

translation.en: That was the accepted methodology.
translation.zh: 这就是当时接受的方法

translation.en: You could be as cruel as you needed to be
translation.zh: 为了让你的运动员出成绩

translation.en: to get what you needed out of your athlete.
translation.zh: 你多么残忍都可以

translation.en: Um, so this is not new.
translation.zh: 所以这不是新鲜事

translation.en: We just weren't good at it. We weren't getting great results.
translation.zh: 我们当时很厉害 成绩很好

translation.en: We were getting okay results.
translation.zh: 成绩都还不错

translation.en: [man] Bela and Martha Karolyi, husband and wife,
translation.zh: （贝拉和玛莎·卡罗利 美国国家女子体操队协调员） 贝拉和玛莎·卡罗利 好一对夫妻教练组合！

translation.en: and what a coaching team they are.
translation.zh: 贝拉和玛莎·卡罗利 好一对夫妻教练组合！

translation.en: [Sey] And then Bela and Martha Karolyi came here, and they...
translation.zh: 然后贝拉和玛莎·卡罗利来了

translation.en: validated that approach.
translation.zh: 他们确认了这种做法

translation.en: If success is winning, you know, medals in the Olympics,
translation.zh: 如果成功就是赢得奥运金牌

translation.en: then, you know, they proved that that methodology was successful
translation.zh: 那他们证明了这种方法是成功的

translation.en: and was the right way to coach.
translation.zh: 是正确的教练方法

translation.en: People know the Karolyis, but I'm not sure many of them really know their history.
translation.zh: 大家都知道卡罗利夫妇 但知道他们历史的人大概并不多

translation.en: [woman] Chris, this could be the highlight of the compulsory event.
translation.zh: 克里斯 这可能是现代运动的高光时刻

translation.en: She is one of the technically strongest, best gymnasts that I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 是我见过技术最好的体操运动员之一

translation.en: Watch this.
translation.zh: 看好了

translation.en: Beautiful rhythm. Right to a handstand.
translation.zh: 美丽的节奏 直接手倒立

translation.en: Oh, look at that amplitude.
translation.zh: 噢 看这幅度

translation.en: [man] Faultless. Absolutely faultless.
translation.zh: 完美无瑕 绝对完美无瑕

translation.en: Nadia Comaneci.
translation.zh: 纳迪娅·科马内奇

translation.en: Now, what are the judges gonna say about that?
translation.zh: 现在 裁判们会怎么打分呢？

translation.en: There's the smile.
translation.zh: 笑容满面

translation.en: Some cynics say it had to be trained...
translation.zh: 有些刻薄的人会说笑容也要训练

translation.en: because she so rarely smiles.
translation.zh: 因为她笑真是稀罕事

translation.en: [Manly] They were Nicolae Ceausescu's chosen coaches
translation.zh: 他们由齐奥塞斯库钦定

translation.en: for the Romanian national gymnastics team.
translation.zh: 担任罗马尼亚国家体操队的教练

translation.en: And they coached Nadia Comaneci to a gold medal in 1976.
translation.zh: 他们训练纳迪娅·科马内奇 夺得了1976年的金牌

translation.en: [Sey] If you look back at teams from the '50s and the '60s,
translation.zh: 如果你回看五六十年代的队伍

translation.en: they look like grown women.
translation.zh: 她们看起来像成年女子

translation.en: They are grown women.
translation.zh: 她们就是成年女子

translation.en: But that started to change in the late '60s,
translation.zh: 但是在六十年代末就开始改变了

translation.en: but really solidified in 1976
translation.zh: 在1976年确立下来

translation.en: when Nadia won the Olympics as a 14-year-old.
translation.zh: 这一年纳迪娅获得了奥运冠军 年仅14岁

translation.en: And there was just this mad rush of little girls that wanted to do gymnastics,
translation.zh: 就出现了小女孩练体操的热潮

translation.en: 'cause we related to her.
translation.zh: 因为受到了她的激励

translation.en: And what emerged was an aesthetic that was very, very young. Childlike.
translation.zh: 出现了非常年轻、像小孩一样的审美

translation.en: And so it created a really dangerous environment,
translation.zh: 所以这产生了非常危险的环境

translation.en: because eating disorders became very prevalent.
translation.zh: 因为进食障碍变得非常普遍

translation.en: You know, delaying menstruation
translation.zh: 月经延迟

translation.en: and delaying maturation.
translation.zh: 成熟延迟

translation.en: But I think people really believed
translation.zh: 但是我想大家真的认为

translation.en: that, for the more difficult skills to be performed, you had to be tiny.
translation.zh: 如果要做更难的技术 你就得小

translation.en: There's also the benefit of the coaches
translation.zh: 姑娘们年纪小 还有一个好处

translation.en: having more control when the girls are younger.
translation.zh: 就是教练们能更好地控制她们

translation.en: [Manly] What's important for people to know
translation.zh: 很重要的一点是

translation.en: is that Nicolae Ceausescu and his regime
translation.zh: 很重要的一点是 齐奥塞斯库和他的政权

translation.en: was arguably the most repressive regime in the Eastern Bloc.
translation.zh: 可能是东欧阵营最高压的政权

translation.en: And the Karolyis were part of that system.
translation.zh: 而卡罗利夫妇就是这个制度的一部分

translation.en: [man] The Romanians started this idea
translation.zh: 罗马尼亚人想出了这样的主意

translation.en: of training gymnasts from a very young age.
translation.zh: 从很小年纪开始训练体操运动员

translation.en: Like from six years old, they are selected from their kindergarten or elementary schools,
translation.zh: 大概六岁的样子 就被从幼儿园或者小学里挑选出来

translation.en: and we tested them.
translation.zh: 我们对其进行测试

translation.en: Flexibility, strength and, uh, no fear.
translation.zh: 柔韧性、力量以及无畏

translation.en: -[woman] No fear? -No fear, yes. No fear.
translation.zh: -无畏？ -是的 无畏

translation.en: We have to put this in the context of the Cold War.
translation.zh: 这要放到冷战的背景之下

translation.en: The Soviet Union or Romania,
translation.zh: 苏联或者罗马尼亚

translation.en: they could not say, "Okay, we build better products than the American side."
translation.zh: 他们没办法说我们的产品比美国好

translation.en: But we can have Nadia Comaneci.
translation.zh: 但我们有纳迪娅·科马内奇

translation.en: Nadia was Romania's best product.
translation.zh: 纳迪娅是罗马尼亚最好的产品

translation.en: [woman] 1976, Nadia was definitely the one to be like at that point,
translation.zh: 1976年 纳迪娅当时很受喜爱

translation.en: and the Russians, the Romanians, the East Germans,
translation.zh: 俄国人、罗马尼亚人、东德人

translation.en: all the, what we call the Communist Bloc,
translation.zh: 所有我们所称的共产阵营的人

translation.en: they were the best, by far, in the sport.
translation.zh: 至今为止 他们是运动方面最厉害的

translation.en: And certainly, you always want to be like the ones who are winning.
translation.zh: 你当然总希望自己取胜

translation.en: But we would be at competitions, and they always seemed very scared.
translation.zh: 但我们在赛场上 总是看到她们很害怕

translation.en: The gymnasts did.
translation.zh: 体操运动员们

translation.en: And you never saw them talk,
translation.zh: 你从来见不到她们说话

translation.en: and they almost looked like robots.
translation.zh: 她们几乎就像机器人一样

translation.en: The-- All I can say is the athletes...
translation.zh: 我只能说这些运动员们

translation.en: did not look happy, ever.
translation.zh: 看起来并不高兴 总是如此

translation.en: [Pozsar] From the very beginning, Bela had this idea
translation.zh: 从一开始 贝拉就是这样的想法

translation.en: that we will have total control over the girls
translation.zh: 我们要能够完全控制女孩们

translation.en: absolute control.
translation.zh: 绝对的控制

translation.en: Bela was controlling their weight.
translation.zh: 贝拉当时控制她们的体重

translation.en: They had to step every single day on a scale.
translation.zh: 她们每天都要称体重

translation.en: He was yelling at them and putting them down.
translation.zh: 他吼她们 骂她们

translation.en: "Fat cow."
translation.zh: “肥牛”

translation.en: "You are a pig."
translation.zh: “你是猪”

translation.en: He, you know, slapped the girls,
translation.zh: 他会扇女孩们巴掌

translation.en: and the girls were very, very scared.
translation.zh: 女孩们非常非常害怕

translation.en: Martha had this habit of grabbing their neck
translation.zh: 玛莎有一个习惯 抓住她们的脖子

translation.en: and get her fingers into their necks.
translation.zh: 用手指掐她们的脖子

translation.en: Plus slap them, you know, a lot.
translation.zh: 再加上扇她们巴掌 经常这样

translation.en: The girls have the prints of the... her rings on their faces sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时候女孩们脸上会有她戒指的印迹

translation.en: [woman] Did you report it to the authorities?
translation.zh: -你报警了吗？ -当然报警了

translation.en: [Pozsar] Yes, sure. I reported them, but also you have to understand
translation.zh: 我举报了他们 但是你得明白

translation.en: that nobody took any kind of measures, you know, to stop them.
translation.zh: 没有人采取任何措施阻止他们

translation.en: In Romania, that was acceptable.
translation.zh: 在罗马尼亚 这是可以接受的

translation.en: [man] When he heads for his ranch on a rural highway north of Houston,
translation.zh: 他开着四驱车 在休斯顿北面的乡村公路上疾驰

translation.en: in his four-wheel drive with Merle Haggard on the dashboard cassette deck
translation.zh: 前往他的农庄 车上播放着梅尔·哈格德的录音带

translation.en: and a day's collection of bugs on the windshield...
translation.zh: 挡风玻璃上攒了一天的虫子

translation.en: well, you'd swear you were riding with a born Texan.
translation.zh: 你一定会以为 开车的是土生土长的德州人

translation.en: When Bela Karolyi defected to the West, he defected to the West.
translation.zh: 贝拉·卡罗利叛逃到西方 真的是叛逃到了西部

translation.en: [Pozsar] When we defected together...
translation.zh: 我们一起叛逃

translation.en: we knew that United States has lots and lots of talent.
translation.zh: 我们知道美国有很多人才

translation.en: We saw the talent in the international competitions.
translation.zh: 我们在国际比赛中看到了人才

translation.en: And we know that it's a very, very fertile soil for athletes in United States.
translation.zh: 我们知道美国是培养运动员的沃土

translation.en: I declare open the Olympic Games of Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 我宣布洛杉矶奥运会开幕

translation.en: Mary Lou.
translation.zh: 玛莉·卢

translation.en: Never better, okay?
translation.zh: 好好表现 好吧？

translation.en: The best... the best what you can vault, all right?
translation.zh: 拿出你最好的表现 好吗？

translation.en: [Talavera] With Bela and Martha coming over here...
translation.zh: 贝拉和玛莎过来之后

translation.en: we copy, cut, paste their style, and now we're doing it in the US.
translation.zh: 我们复制、剪切、黏贴他们的风格 现在我们在美国这样做了

translation.en: We knew what their system was,
translation.zh: 我们当时就知道 他们的体系是什么样的

translation.en: but we also knew they won all the time.
translation.zh: 但我们也知道他们总是赢

translation.en: America loves a winner. And when a perky little bundle of energy
translation.zh: 美国热爱赢家 来自西弗吉尼亚玛莉·卢·雷顿 充满了自信活泼的能量

translation.en: from West Virginia named Mary Lou Retton took home the gold medal in gymnastics
translation.zh: 来自西弗吉尼亚玛莉·卢·雷顿 充满了自信活泼的能量 当她将84年奥运会的体操金牌 带回家的时候

translation.en: at the '84 Olympics, she became the national sweetheart.
translation.zh: 当她将84年奥运会的体操金牌 带回家的时候 成为了全国上下的小甜心

translation.en: [man] I was the president of USA Gymnastics in '84,
translation.zh: 84年的时候 我是美国体操协会的主席

translation.en: and one of my goals was I wanted our property on all the networks.
translation.zh: 我的目标之一 就是要上各个电视网

translation.en: That was the most valuable thing we could do to build our brand,
translation.zh: 这是最有价值的事 可以建立我们品牌

translation.en: the image of our sport.
translation.zh: 打造我们运动的形象

translation.en: And then, all of a sudden, gymnastics was earning almost $12 million a year in revenue in 1991.
translation.zh: 突然之间 在1991年 体操达到近1200万美元的年收入

translation.en: [Alesia] USA Gymnastics had a wholesome image,
translation.zh: 美国体操协会以前的形象很好

translation.en: and they had companies who wanted to be attached to that image.
translation.zh: 有很多公司愿意与这种形象联系起来

translation.en: And that image was vital, uh, to protect.
translation.zh: 保护这种形象至关重要

translation.en: [Penny] What makes this sport so special are the athletes.
translation.zh: 这项运动特殊之处就在于其运动员

translation.en: I've never seen athletes that train as hard as these guys do
translation.zh: 我从来没有见过 运动员像他们新练得如此刻苦

translation.en: and that are as intelligent and personable.
translation.zh: 他们聪明 和蔼

translation.en: I mean, it's just the complete package.
translation.zh: 非常出色

translation.en: [Evans] Steve Penny was hired as vice president of marketing
translation.zh: （斯蒂夫·佩尼） 斯蒂夫·佩尼刚来的时候 职务是负责市场营销的副主席

translation.en: when they started out.
translation.zh: 斯蒂夫·佩尼刚来的时候 职务是负责市场营销的副主席

translation.en: He worked with television marketing, then he worked with USA Cycling.
translation.zh: 他之前在电视台从事市场营销工作 后来去了美国自行车运动协会

translation.en: And, um, by the end of the '90s,
translation.zh: 到了九十年代末

translation.en: the focus of USA Gymnastics just became raising money...
translation.zh: 美国体操协会的终点变成了筹款

translation.en: attracting sponsorships
translation.zh: 吸引赞助

translation.en: and, you know, making the best out of their Olympic athletes.
translation.zh: 最好地利用他们的奥运选手

translation.en: [Berta] Eventually, Steve Penny became the president of USA Gymnastics.
translation.zh: 最终 斯蒂夫·佩尼 成了美国体操协会主席

translation.en: So you had an organization that was run by a sports marketing expert.
translation.zh: 这个组织由体育营销专家来管理

translation.en: And, uh, that's what he cared about.
translation.zh: 他关心的就是这个

translation.en: He cared about marketing this brand.
translation.zh: 他关心营销这个品牌

translation.en: [man] This is the image of Bela Karolyi the world has grown accustomed to seeing.
translation.zh: 全世界已经习惯看到 贝拉·卡罗利这样的形象

translation.en: The intense, relentless coach
translation.zh: 一位严厉无情的教练

translation.en: who now turns out championship gymnasts for the United States.
translation.zh: 现在为美国带来冠军体操选手

translation.en: [Berta] You know, these children are all being advised by adults
translation.zh: 大人们告诉孩子们

translation.en: as to how they can realize their Olympic dream.
translation.zh: 要如何才能实现奥运梦

translation.en: So you're basically using that child's dream to build this brand.
translation.zh: 所以等于是在利用孩子的梦想 来创造这个品牌

translation.en: And they were so busy trying to sell that brand...
translation.zh: 他们忙着销售这个品牌

translation.en: that they didn't have time for those girls.
translation.zh: 以至于没有时间估计这些女孩们

translation.en: [man] Right now, we turn to women's gymnastics
translation.zh: 现在 我们看一下女子体操

translation.en: and the United States, which has become a power in recent years,
translation.zh: 美国在近年来 已经成为一股很强的力量

translation.en: now looking to become the power.
translation.zh: 现在有望成为世界霸主

translation.en: I remember watching the Olympics in my little apartment, um, in 1996.
translation.zh: 我记得1996年 我在自己的小公寓里看奥运比赛

translation.en: And Kerri Strug was vaulting.
translation.zh: 克丽·斯特鲁格当时在跳马中的表现

translation.en: And it was viewed sort of as this heroic Olympic achievement,
translation.zh: 被视作是英雄般的奥运成就

translation.en: but I saw it differently at the time.
translation.zh: 但当时对此我有不同看法

translation.en: [man] So, Kerri Strug, if she can score 9.493...
translation.zh: 如果克丽·斯特鲁格能得到9.493分

translation.en: then she will win the team gold... for the USA.
translation.zh: 她将为美国赢得团体金牌

translation.en: She's the last to go. She's the only one who can do it.
translation.zh: 她最后一个出场 只有她能够一锤定音

translation.en: [woman] This is scary.
translation.zh: 很吓人

translation.en: [man] She is limping.
translation.zh: 她一瘸一拐

translation.en: Here's the reaction of her parents.
translation.zh: 这是她父母的反应

translation.en: And she falls on the first vault, and she's clearly in a lot of pain.
translation.zh: 第一条她摔倒了 她显然非常痛苦

translation.en: She's limping back to the other end of the runway.
translation.zh: 一瘸一拐地走回跑道的另一端

translation.en: We learn afterwards that she had been competing on a severe injury.
translation.zh: 我们后来知道 她一直是带着严重的伤病在比赛

translation.en: You can do it. You can do it.
translation.zh: 你可以的

translation.en: [Sey] You get two vaults, and the highest score counts.
translation.zh: 跳两次 取最高分

translation.en: And Team USA needed that second vault.
translation.zh: 美国队需要她再跳一次

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -[man] Go. -Go! Go!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: [Sey] And she does it. She lands the vault on one foot.
translation.zh: 她跳了 单腿落地

translation.en: [man] Kerri Strug is hurt.
translation.zh: 克丽·斯特鲁格受伤了！

translation.en: [Sey] And she literally crawls off the mat.
translation.zh: 她真的就是爬下了垫子

translation.en: She crawls away.
translation.zh: 她是爬回来的

translation.en: [Sey] And Larry Nassar, at the time nobody knew, but is there.
translation.zh: 拉里·纳萨尔就在现场 当时没人知道他

translation.en: [man] She's being carried off... by two of the medical technicians.
translation.zh: 她被两名医疗人员抬下场

translation.en: We have got to find out if she's-- A 9.712! She has done it!
translation.zh: 我们得看看她是不是… 9.712分！她成功了！

translation.en: Kerri Strug has won the gold medal for the United States team.
translation.zh: 克丽·斯特鲁格为美国队夺得了金牌

translation.en: The Russians are in tears.
translation.zh: 俄国人在哭泣

translation.en: They got so close, and the Americans took it away from them.

translation.zh: 立即将指控情况报告警方

translation.en: And there were hundreds of pages, including a half dozen or so e-mails.
translation.zh: 有数百页 包括大概几十封电邮

translation.en: This is a July 22, 2015 e-mail.

translation.en: So this was after Maggie had reported to USA Gymnastics.

translation.en: to defend himself from allegations of abuse.
translation.zh: 就性侵指控为自己辩解

translation.en: Once you find the tender point, you can stay on it.
translation.zh: 找到软的点之后 就可以稳住

translation.en: [Evans] I think anybody that saw that and was a reasonable person
translation.zh: 我觉得任何人看到这个视频 如果是关心孩子的、有理性的人

translation.en: and cared about kids would have taken some action immediately.
translation.zh: 如果是关心孩子的、有理性的人 都会立刻采取措施

translation.en: And there were other e-mails between Nassar
translation.zh: 还有其他的电邮 是纳萨尔 和几位美国体操协会官员之间的

translation.en: and a couple of USA Gymnastics officials.
translation.zh: 是纳萨尔 和几位美国体操协会官员之间的

translation.en: Pretty soon, we're fishing those out
translation.zh: 很快 我们把这些都查出来了

translation.en: and looking at this timeline we've created

translation.en: of, you know, these lies they were telling to cover for him.
translation.zh: 他们为他掩盖谎言

translation.en: And it says, "We explained on the call, USA Gymnastics has been made aware
translation.zh: 邮件上说：“我们在电话里解释过了 美国体操协会已经了解到 对于你的一些治疗方法的关切

translation.en: of concerns regarding some of your therapy techniques
translation.zh: 美国体操协会已经了解到 对于你的一些治疗方法的关切

translation.en: and that athletes aren't comfortable with certain areas of their body that are being treated."
translation.zh: 有些运动员 对于治疗的某些身体区域觉得不适”

translation.en: [Kwiatkowski] "In addition, we suggest, prior to the championships,
translation.zh: “而且 我们建议 在锦标赛之前

translation.en: that Ron Galimore will once again advise the medical staff,
translation.zh: 罗恩·加利摩尔将告知 医务工作人员 运动员照料协调员

translation.en: the athlete care coordinator, that you cannot attend for personal reasons,
translation.zh: 罗恩·加利摩尔将告知 医务工作人员 运动员照料协调员 你因为个人原因无法参加

translation.en: unless you prefer a different approach that we are prepared to discuss."
translation.zh: 除非你希望采用其他方法 那我们可以讨论”

translation.en: All right. All right, thank you. Bye.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢 再见

translation.en: So tell me what the-- What's the headline? What's the lede?
translation.zh: 好的 告诉我 头条是什么？ 开场白是什么？

translation.en: USA Gymnastics, in negotiating, basically, with Larry,
translation.zh: 美国体操协会在与拉里协商的过程中

translation.en: agreed to lie to people and say that he was sick,
translation.zh: 同意对外撒谎 说他是病了

translation.en: and that's why he couldn't go to a particular competition.
translation.zh: 所以才不能去参加某一个特定比赛

translation.en: -[Berta] Mm-hmm. -So that... I mean, that shows a cover-up.
translation.zh: 所以 这就显示在隐瞒

translation.en: It's a pretty good story.
translation.zh: 写得很好

translation.en: if they don't take it seriously, don't investigate it well, and if they choose not to file charges.

translation.en: against Michigan State and USAG, USOC.

translation.zh: 他在民事诉讼中代表这些受害者

translation.en: of the People of the State of Michigan v. Larry Nassar
translation.zh: 也就是密歇根州诉拉里·纳萨尔一案

translation.en: This is a neighborhood in Holt, Michigan.

translation.en: It's not far from MSU's campus, um,
translation.zh: 离密歇根州立大学校园不远

translation.en: where he lived.
translation.zh: 他就住在那里

translation.zh: 基于这个信息

translation.zh: 我们取得了对他家的搜查令

translation.en: We executed the search warrant on September 20th, 2016.
translation.zh: 我们在2016年9月20日执行了搜查令

translation.en: One of our crime scene investigators came in midday
translation.zh: 我们有一位犯罪现场调查员 中午过来说

translation.en: and said, "The trash hasn't been picked up yet.
translation.zh: “垃圾还没有收

translation.en: It's still out by the curb, and all the trash is still in it."
translation.zh: 还在路边 垃圾都还在里面”

translation.en: So we did what's called a trash pull.
translation.zh: 于是我们翻了垃圾

translation.en: Inside the trash, there were several hard drives...
translation.zh: 在垃圾中 有几个硬盘

translation.en: with his name and phone number written on them in Sharpie.
translation.zh: 他的名字和电话号码 用记号笔写在上面

translation.en: That's where the first images of child sexually abusive material...
translation.zh: 第一批儿童性虐材料被发现了

translation.en: commonly referred to as child porn, were found.
translation.zh: 一般也称之为儿童色情物品

translation.en: Thirty-seven thousand images.
translation.zh: 3.7万张图片

translation.en: [woman] Michigan State University and Team USA Gymnastics doctor,
translation.zh: 密歇根州立大学 及美国体操协会的医生 拉里·纳萨尔被捕

translation.en: Larry Nassar, has been arrested.
translation.zh: 及美国体操协会的医生 拉里·纳萨尔被捕

translation.en: Nassar will be charged with three counts of first-degree criminal sexual conduct
translation.zh: 纳萨尔将被起诉三项一级犯罪性行为

translation.en: with someone younger than 13. Attorney General Bill Schuette is...
translation.zh: 有些受害人还不到13岁 总检察长比尔·舒特…

translation.en: [Povilaitis] We were looking toward trial, um, and preparing for that.
translation.zh: 我们期待审判 也在进行准备

translation.en: And... and we really looked at what could get the highest sentence for him.

translation.en: In Michigan, we have a statute that, if you have a victim under 13
translation.zh: 在密歇根州 有法定刑期 如果受害人在13岁以下 而且阴道被插入

translation.en: and she's penetrated, it's a 25-year mandatory minimum.
translation.zh: 如果受害人在13岁以下 而且阴道被插入 则法定最低刑期为25年

translation.en: And then we identified those cases that we thought were strongest
translation.zh: 然后我们挑选出 我们认为最强有力的案子

translation.en: and brought those in February of 2017.
translation.zh: 于2017年提起公诉

translation.en: Those victims knew to report because of Rachael's disclosure.
translation.zh: 这些受害者知道报案 是因为瑞秋披露了实情

translation.en: She, you know, at that point, was the only public face.

translation.en: [Munford] When a victim comes to report a sexual assault, it's a scary thing
translation.zh: 受害者举报性侵 是非常恐怖的事

translation.en: because they're giving up so much control by telling someone what happened to them.
translation.zh: 因为说出发生在自己身上的事 就等于对很多情况失去控制

translation.en: But each of the survivors were very determined...

translation.en: to make it very clear to everybody...

translation.en: what really went on.

translation.zh: 故意毁灭证据罪

translation.en: of traveling with intent to commit a sexual assault overseas,
translation.zh: 撤销以海外性侵为目的而旅行的罪名

translation.en: which is a violation of federal law.
translation.zh: 这是违反联邦法律

translation.en: [Povilaitis] Good morning, Your Honor. Angela Povilaitis.
translation.zh: 早上好 法官大人 我是安吉拉·波维莱德斯

translation.en: On behalf of the people and the Michigan Department of Attorney General,
translation.zh: 代表人民和密歇根州司法部

translation.en: I will let the other attorneys--
translation.zh: 我会让其他检察官…

translation.en: We were able to lay out the terms of the sentencing range.

translation.en: But we also wanted victim buy-in. Like, we wanted them,

translation.zh: 是他必须同意所有受害者

translation.en: if they chose, to give an impact statement.

translation.en: So that was something, quite frankly, I am really proud about.
translation.zh: 对于这一点 说实话 我很自豪

translation.en: If I may, our first survivor to speak today, Your Honor,

translation.zh: 是前国家队成员 很高兴她能来到这里

translation.zh: 她的名字叫洁米·丹泽谢尔

translation.en: [judge] Thank you. What would you like us to know?

translation.en: Larry, you saw all the physical, mental, and emotional abuse

translation.en: from our coaches and USAG national staff.
translation.zh: 对我们身体上 心理上和情绪上的虐待

translation.zh: 你装作站在我这一边 说他们都是魔鬼

translation.zh: 但你不但没有保护孩子们 将你看到的虐待行为进行举报

translation.en: you used your position of power to manipulate and abuse as well.
translation.zh: 你却利用自己的职权 也进行操纵和虐待

translation.en: You knew I was powerless.
translation.zh: 你知道我当时很无助

translation.en: I'm here today with all these other women, not victims, but survivors...
translation.zh: 我今天在这里 与其他这些女性一起 我们不是受害者 而是幸存者

translation.zh: 要当面告诉你 你操纵的日子已经结束了

translation.zh: 我们现在可以发声了

translation.zh: 我们现在有力量了

translation.zh: 作为一名奥运体操运动员

translation.en: being able to say...
translation.zh: 能够说出

translation.zh: “你已经不再有力量操控我了”

translation.en: I can finally say I am proud to be an Olympian.
translation.zh: 我终于可以说 我为自己是一名奥运选手而自豪

translation.en: It's been so hard to be... proud of anything.
translation.zh: 一直以来 要有任何自豪感 太难了

translation.en: So to even say that, for me, is like, "Okay.
translation.zh: 所以哪怕就是说出来 对我来说就像在说：“好的

translation.en: I think I'm getting a little better. I feel proud of something."
translation.zh: 我想我好一些了 我能够为一些事感到自豪了”

translation.en: [Povilaitis] Judge, the first victim will be publicly identified,

translation.en: I told Michigan State University back in 1997.

translation.zh: 她决定公开发言”

translation.en: Because it meant that they felt safe enough.
translation.zh: 因为这意味着 她们觉得自己安全了

translation.zh: 意味着她们可以不再把羞耻 放在自己身上

translation.zh: 而是放在施虐者身上

translation.zh: 所以我会朗读她的公开声明

translation.zh: “美国体操协会和美国奥委会

translation.zh: 没有为我和我的队友及朋友们 提供安全的训练环境”

translation.zh: 他是对玛吉·尼科尔斯施暴”

translation.en: to let you know that the next person you will hear from is Rachael Denhollander.

translation.en: [Denhollander] There are two major purposes
translation.zh: 我们的司法体系有两个主要目的

translation.en: in our criminal justice system, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 我们的司法体系有两个主要目的 法官大人

translation.en: The pursuit of justice and the protection of the innocent.
translation.zh: 追求正义 以及保护无辜者

translation.en: Neither of these purposes can be met if anything less than the maximum available sentence
translation.zh: 如果不能对拉里判处 认罪协议允许的最高刑罚

translation.en: under the plea agreement is imposed upon Larry for his crimes.
translation.zh: 则这两个目的都无法实现

translation.en: So I ask... how much priority should be placed
translation.zh: 所以 我要问 用最严厉的法律 去传达这样一个信息

translation.en: on communicating that the fullest weight of the law
translation.zh: 用最严厉的法律 去传达这样一个信息 要保护其他无辜的孩子 免受性侵所带来的击碎灵魂的毁坏

translation.en: will be used to protect another innocent child
translation.zh: 要保护其他无辜的孩子 免受性侵所带来的击碎灵魂的毁坏

translation.en: from the soul-shattering devastation that sexual assault brings?
translation.zh: 要保护其他无辜的孩子 免受性侵所带来的击碎灵魂的毁坏 这一点要放在何种优先程度？

translation.en: I submit to you that these children are worth everything.
translation.zh: 我向您报告 这些孩子值得用一切去保护

translation.en: Worth every protection the law can offer.
translation.zh: 值得法律用尽一切办法予以保护

translation.en: Worth the maximum sentence.
translation.zh: 值得判处最高刑罚

translation.en: [judge] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Manly] It's the most incredible thing I've ever seen as a lawyer.
translation.zh: 这是我作为律师 见过的最感人的场景

translation.en: It's the most incredible thing I've ever seen in my life.
translation.zh: 这是我一生见过的最感人的场景

translation.en: He received two 60-year sentences
translation.zh: 他被判处两个60年有期徒刑

translation.en: and, uh, you know, the tongue-lashing of the century.
translation.zh: 世纪重判

translation.en: Now, what people don't realize is that...
translation.zh: 大家没有意识到的一点是

translation.en: for almost every one of these girls, this is their first sexual experience.
translation.zh: 对于几乎所有这些女孩来说 那是她们第一次性经验

translation.en: And when you take the ability to love and express love from somebody
translation.zh: 当你夺走别人去爱和表达爱的能力

translation.en: and take it away or damage it...
translation.zh: 将它夺走或者伤害

translation.en: it profoundly affects their psyche.
translation.zh: 这会深远地影响他们的心灵

translation.en: And, at... at the end of the day...
translation.zh: 说到底

translation.en: that's really what he did.
translation.zh: 他其实就是做了这样的事

translation.en: [stammers] He stole that part of them.
translation.zh: 他把她们的心灵偷走了一块

translation.en: And they're all struggling to get it back.
translation.zh: 她们都在挣扎着要拿回来

translation.en: And most of them should never have met Larry Nassar,
translation.zh: 要是管事的人做了该做的事 她们中的多数人 根本不应该遇见拉里·纳萨尔

translation.en: had the people in charge of him just done the right thing.
translation.zh: 她们中的多数人 根本不应该遇见拉里·纳萨尔

translation.en: And the piece that's missing...
translation.zh: 这里面缺少的一块

translation.en: is the accountability for those who knew better
translation.zh: 就是这些失职的人承担责任

translation.en: and... the adults who were suppose to protect these athletes
translation.zh: 这些人应该要保护运动员

translation.en: and these women and these girls.
translation.zh: 保护这些女性 这些姑娘

translation.en: And, um, we don't have that yet.
translation.zh: 缺少的这一块现在还没有实现

translation.en: Clearly, USA Gymnastics was not anxious to have this in public.
translation.zh: 很明显 美国体操协会并不急于公布此事

translation.en: They succeeded for a year in keeping an absolute lid on it.
translation.zh: 他们成功地把这件事压住了一年

translation.en: And what I found out is McKayla Maroney was forced to sign a nondisclosure agreement.
translation.zh: 我发现麦凯拉·马罗尼 被迫签署保密协议

translation.en: And I believe they required other athletes who were victims of Dr. Nassar
translation.zh: 我相信他们也要求其他运动员 也就是纳萨尔案的受害者 签署保密协议

translation.en: to sign NDAs.
translation.zh: 也就是纳萨尔案的受害者 签署保密协议

translation.en: This was a full-court press by USA Gymnastics to keep this quiet
translation.zh: 美国体操协会进行全场紧逼 要将此事压住 将损失最小化

translation.en: and to minimize the damage.
translation.zh: 要将此事压住 将损失最小化

translation.en: [man] We began this process in January following the disgusting revelations
translation.zh: 我们从一月份开始这个程序 在此之前 美国体操协会前队医

translation.en: that former USA Gymnastics team doctor Larry Nassar...
translation.zh: 在此之前 美国体操协会前队医 拉里·纳萨尔在20多年中 性侵数百位运动员的丑闻曝光

translation.en: sexually abused hundreds of athletes over the span of two decades,
translation.zh: 拉里·纳萨尔在20多年中 性侵数百位运动员的丑闻曝光

translation.en: even well after numerous survivors alerted authorities about his actions.
translation.zh: 多位幸存者多年前 就已经向相关部门举报他的行为

translation.en: As we now know, many of our American Olympians,
translation.zh: 我们现在知道 我们多位奥运选手

translation.en: who stood tall in representing our nation in the international stage,
translation.zh: 在国际舞台上高高站立 代表我们的国家

translation.en: were suffering behind the scenes.
translation.zh: 在幕后也饱受折磨

translation.en: [Berta] We're right in the middle of, uh, finishing up a story
translation.zh: 我们还在写这样一篇报道

translation.en: that's based on e-mails that were going back and forth
translation.zh: 报道是基于美国体操协会 和拉里·纳萨尔的电子邮件往来…

translation.en: between USA Gymnastics and Larry Nassar, in which they basically--
translation.zh: 和拉里·纳萨尔的电子邮件往来…

translation.en: After all those women... gave their testimony in that courtroom at his sentencing,
translation.zh: 这么多女性在量刑庭上作证之后

translation.en: we kept our nose to the grindstone.
translation.zh: 我们继续努力工作

translation.en: I mean, we were just like... going full bore.
translation.zh: 我们要全速出击

translation.en: Nassar wasn't our target. Our target was USA Gymnastics.
translation.zh: 纳萨尔并不是我们的目标 我们的目标是美国体操协会

translation.en: [woman] USAG struggles to restructure and reinvent itself amid allegations
translation.zh: 美国体操协会 挣扎着对自己进行重组改造

translation.en: it turned a blind eye and even covered up rampant sexual abuse
translation.zh: 此前有人指控协会 对于前队医拉里·纳萨尔的猖獗性侵 视若罔闻 甚至予以掩盖

translation.en: by former team doctor Larry Nassar.
translation.zh: 对于前队医拉里·纳萨尔的猖獗性侵 视若罔闻 甚至予以掩盖

translation.en: [man] Um, I'll begin with the questions.
translation.zh: 我先提问

translation.en: And I'm gonna begin with you, uh, Mr. Penny.
translation.zh: 从你开始问 佩尼先生

translation.en: Former gymnastics doctor Larry Nassar
translation.zh: 前体操医生拉里·纳萨尔

translation.en: was convicted of criminal sexual conduct with gymnasts,
translation.zh: 被判犯有对体操运动员性侵的罪行

translation.en: including members of the USA national team.
translation.zh: 包括美国国家队的成员

translation.en: My understanding is that you were first informed about this abuse
translation.zh: 我的理解是 你在2015年6月17日 被告知该性侵情况

translation.en: on June 17, 2015.
translation.zh: 你在2015年6月17日 被告知该性侵情况

translation.en: Is that correct?
translation.zh: 是这样吗？

translation.en: Uh, Mr. Chairman, um, with respect to you and your question and the committee...
translation.zh: 主席先生 对于您以及您的问题 以及对于委员会

translation.en: uh, I have been instructed by my attorney
translation.zh: 根据我的律师的要求

translation.en: to assert my rights under the Fifth Amendment to the Constitution.
translation.zh: 我援引《宪法第五修正案》下的权利

translation.en: For that reason, I must respectfully decline to answer your question.
translation.zh: 因此 我必须恭敬地拒绝回答您的问题

translation.en: [Kwiatkowski] As we started doing more reporting
translation.zh: 随着我们对斯蒂夫·佩尼

translation.en: on Steve Penny's handling of the allegations against Larry Nassar,
translation.zh: 随着我们对斯蒂夫·佩尼 处理投诉纳萨尔案件的深入报道

translation.en: we started looking more closely at his relationships with law enforcement.
translation.zh: 我们开始进一步调查 他与执法部门的关系

translation.en: At the same time the FBI was investigating Nassar,
translation.zh: 在联邦调查局调查纳萨尔的同时

translation.en: Penny was talking to him about a job.
translation.zh: 佩尼在和他说一份工作的事

translation.en: This is not the only instance in which the relationship between USA Gymnastics
translation.zh: 美国体操协会 与印第安纳波利斯的执法机关 之间的关系受到质疑

translation.en: and law enforcement agencies in Indianapolis was called into question.
translation.zh: 与印第安纳波利斯的执法机关 之间的关系受到质疑 这并不是第一次

translation.en: -[Berta] Yeah. -Okay.
translation.zh: -对 -好的

translation.en: [reporter] Penny sought to cultivate a close relationship
translation.zh: 佩尼争取与联邦调查人员 建立密切关系

translation.en: with federal investigators to protect the image of USA Gymnastics,
translation.zh: 佩尼争取与联邦调查人员 建立密切关系 以保护美国体操协会的形象

translation.en: going so far as to offer a job to one of the FBI agents.
translation.zh: 居然想一名联邦调查局探员 提供一份工作机会

translation.en: Mr. Penny, I respect your right to invoke your Fifth Amendment privilege.
translation.zh: 佩尼先生 我尊重你援引第五修正案特权的权利

translation.en: You have that right.
translation.zh: 你有这个权利

translation.en: But you also have a responsibility.
translation.zh: 但你也有责任

translation.en: You were part of an organization...
translation.zh: 你是这个组织的一部分

translation.en: that, in effect, prioritized medals and money over...
translation.zh: 这个组织实际上把奖牌和金钱

translation.en: the young women and girls who were sexually abused by...
translation.zh: 看得比受纳萨尔性侵的年轻女性 和女孩

translation.en: Mr. Nassar.
translation.zh: 更为重要

translation.en: Don't you feel you have a responsibility to the athletes who are here today
translation.zh: 对于今天来到这里的运动员 以及全国各地的人

translation.en: and to others around the country to be more forthcoming?
translation.zh: 你不觉得自己有责任 说出更多实情吗？

translation.en: Respectfully, senator, I would like to answer your question.
translation.zh: 尊敬的参议员 我想要回答你的问题

translation.en: However, I've been instructed by my attorney
translation.zh: 然而 根据我的律师的要求

translation.en: to assert my rights under the Fifth Amendment to the Constitution--
translation.zh: 我援引《宪法第五修正案》下的权利

translation.en: Mr. Penny, may I assume that it is your intent to invoke that privilege,
translation.zh: 佩尼先生 在进一步的提问中

translation.en: uh, in further questioning?
translation.zh: 你也会继续援引特权 是吗？

translation.en: [Penny] Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [Moran] Let the record reflect that you have availed yourself
translation.zh: 记录在案 你援引《宪法第五修正案》下的特权

translation.en: of the privileges afforded under the Fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution
translation.zh: 你援引《宪法第五修正案》下的特权

translation.en: not to give testimony that might incriminate you.
translation.zh: 拒绝作出可能使自己获罪的证供

translation.en: Mr. Penny, you're excused.
translation.zh: 佩尼先生 你可以出去了

translation.en: [woman] Shame!
translation.zh: 可耻！

translation.en: What would you like to say to the women that were abused while you were silent?
translation.zh: 对于你沉默期间被虐待的女性 你有什么要说吗？

translation.en: You have anything to say to the survivors?
translation.zh: 有什么话要对幸存者们说吗？

translation.en: Okay. Go ahead and write that up. I'm gonna ask Curly
translation.zh: 好的 写上去

translation.en: -about, uh, this photo that we've got. -Of what?
translation.zh: -我们那张照片的事我来问 -什么照片？

translation.en: It's of him being arrested.
translation.zh: 他被捕的照片

translation.en: -We got a photo of him? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们有他的照片？ -对

translation.en: See, there's the picture. It's...
translation.zh: 看 有一张照片 是…

translation.en: I'm worried that New York Times is coming out with it.
translation.zh: 我怕《纽约时报》会登

translation.en: [woman] Could we go tonight? I mean, do we have enough?
translation.zh: 我们今晚能发吗？ 我们的材料够了吗？

translation.en: [reporter] A major new arrest in the USA Gymnastics scandal tonight.
translation.zh: 美国体操协会丑闻 今晚新逮捕一名重要人物

translation.en: The organization's former president was arrested at a cabin in Tennessee overnight,
translation.zh: 协会的前主席 夜间在田纳西州的一个小屋中被捕

translation.en: more than a year after he resigned.
translation.zh: 距离他辞职已经一年多

translation.en: [woman] The US Marshals Service arresting a former leader of USA Gymnastics
translation.zh: 美国法警前往田纳西的一个小屋 追捕美国体操协会前主席

translation.en: after hunting him down at a cabin in Tennessee.
translation.zh: 美国法警前往田纳西的一个小屋 追捕美国体操协会前主席 最终将其逮捕

translation.en: Authorities accusing him of tampering with evidence in the case against disgraced former gymnastics doctor, Larry Nassar.
translation.zh: 政府指控他在纳萨尔案中破坏证据

translation.en: [woman] So far so good for Maggie Nichols.
translation.zh: 到现在为止 玛吉·尼科尔斯表现很好

translation.en: [man] Maggie was second in the world... in the all-around in 2015.
translation.zh: 2015年全能项目中 玛吉夺得世界第二

translation.en: And yet mysteriously left off the 2016 Olympic team,
translation.zh: 但是神秘地没有入选 2016年奥运代表队

translation.en: did not even earn an alternate spot.
translation.zh: 连候补位置都没拿到

translation.en: So she has all the capabilities of every one of those young ladies who came home from Rio with an Olympic gold medal.
translation.zh: 所以她与里约奥运金牌选手旗鼓相当

translation.en: [Maggie] After the 2016 Olympic trials, I decided to retire from elite gymnastics
translation.zh: 在2016年奥运选拔赛之后 我决定从精英体操比赛中退役

translation.en: and move on to NCAA gymnastics,
translation.zh: 并转战国家大学体育协会体操比赛

translation.en: where I had the opportunity to compete for the University of Oklahoma.
translation.zh: 在这里 我有机会 代表俄克拉荷马大学进行比赛

translation.en: I was the last person to go.
translation.zh: 我是最后一个出场的人

translation.en: And so I did probably the best vault that I did the whole season.
translation.zh: 所以我大概跳出了 整个赛季最好的成绩

translation.en: I've never experienced anything like that before,
translation.zh: 我以前从来没有过这样的体验

translation.en: and that was probably one of the best moments of my life.
translation.zh: 这大概是我一生中最好的时刻之一

translation.en: I think that it was a huge awakening for her,
translation.zh: 我想这对她来说是巨大的觉醒

translation.en: because, all of a sudden, she gets there, they're nice to her.
translation.zh: 因为突然之间 她来到这里 大家都对她很好

translation.en: Gymnastics is fun. The coaches are super good.
translation.zh: 练体操很快乐 教练们人特别好

translation.en: Oh, the healthcare providers are really, really good.
translation.zh: 保健人员都非常好

translation.en: It's not like it was when she was on the elite team.
translation.zh: 和她在精英队的时候不一样

translation.en: [John] Maggie took all the negatives and aimed them into a positive and...
translation.zh: 玛吉把一切负面的东西带走 希望将之变成正面的东西

translation.en: went to Oklahoma...
translation.zh: 去了俄克拉荷马

translation.en: and gave it her all.
translation.zh: 全身心投入

translation.en: She beat them all on every event at every meet for the entire year.
translation.zh: 她每场比赛都把她们全部打败 一整年都是这样

translation.en: [Maggie] When they brought the trophy over,
translation.zh: 然后他们把奖杯拿过来

translation.en: so I think that's kind of the moment that was just... indescribable. It was amazing. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我想那一刻美妙得难以描述 太棒了

translation.en: [girls] Maggie! Come on, Maggie! Go, Maggie!
translation.zh: 加油 玛吉！ 加油 玛吉！

translation.en: [boy] Yeah!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: [Maggie] Elite gymnastics just kind of... beat me down,
translation.zh: 精英体操对我有点打击

translation.en: but I've grown as a person and as a woman.
translation.zh: 但我作为一个人 作为一名女性 已经成长了

translation.en: I found a love for the sport again.
translation.zh: 我再次找到了对体育的热爱

translation.en: [Manly] Were you ever advised by any USAG official,
translation.zh: （2018年1月 卡罗利夫妇宣布 永久关闭 训练营） 在大约2015年6月 有没有美国体操协会的官员告知你

translation.en: in or around June of 2015,
translation.zh: 在大约2015年6月 有没有美国体操协会的官员告知你

translation.en: that they had received a complaint that Dr. Nassar
translation.zh: 他们收到了投诉 称纳萨尔医生在训练营 猥亵了一名国家队的体操运动员？

translation.en: had molested a national team gymnast at the ranch?
translation.zh: 称纳萨尔医生在训练营 猥亵了一名国家队的体操运动员？

translation.en: Yes, I did.
translation.zh: 有的

translation.en: [Manly] And who reported that to you, ma'am?
translation.zh: 是谁告知你的 女士？

translation.en: Mr. Penny.
translation.zh: 佩尼先生

translation.en: [Manly] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Mrs. Karolyi knew, in June of 2015,
translation.zh: 卡罗利太太在2015年6月就知道

translation.en: that Larry Nassar had abused little girls.
translation.zh: 拉里·纳萨尔性侵了小女孩们

translation.en: The law in Texas required her to immediately call the police
translation.zh: 德州法律要求她立即报警

translation.en: or call Child Protective Services and report.
translation.zh: 或者致电儿童保护服务局并报告

translation.en: And she didn't.
translation.zh: 但是她没有这样做

translation.en: Nor did Rhonda Faehn, the head of the women's program, nor did Mr. Penny.
translation.zh: 女子项目负责人朗达·法恩 也没有这样做 佩尼先生也没有

translation.en: That deserves an investigation.
translation.zh: 因此应该要进行调查

translation.en: Other questions?
translation.zh: 还有其他问题吗？

translation.en: USA Gymnastics once wrote to a gymnast
translation.zh: 美国体操协会 曾经给一位体操运动员写信

translation.en: saying that, if she continued to complain about her coach...
translation.zh: 说如果她继续投诉教练

translation.en: she would be off the team,
translation.zh: 就会让她离队

translation.en: regardless of her performance.
translation.zh: 不论她表现如何

translation.en: -And that system is still in place today. -[Kwiatkowski] Right.
translation.zh: -这样的体系现在依然在运行 -对

translation.en: [Berta] They're clinging to a process that has been used in the past to silence dissent.
translation.zh: 他们在坚持使用这种过去的做法 来消灭不同意见

translation.en: That's what that says.
translation.zh: 这就是结论
